website_summaries.verdict: Effective, easy to install window shades that stick to your car window.
pros: Comes with 4 shades that are each 21 inches by 14 inches so they are large enough to fit SUV and van windows
Easy to install by sticking to the inside of each window
Folds up easily to return to storage bag
cons: Some had trouble with the shades sticking in cold weather

customer_reviews.title: Like the shades
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shades for my Semi for those days that the sun is on my driver side, you can see thru the mesh fairly easy and i love i can fold up and put into the little bag it came with, will recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Lsanta

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: It fits to my honda accord car window glass perfectly.very easy to fit since it has sticky black coloured side which should attach to the glass.Really protecs from sunlight.See through filter so that we can see sides of the road through this but with slightly dull color.overall very nice
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Press and stick magic
customer_reviews.text: The old suction cup roller type shades we had were no longer sticking so I opted for these based on size and function. These are being used in a CRV and fit the window well covering a greater surface area than the ones being replaced. The size is close to accurate, whereas description states 21x14 and they are 20.25x14. They work just as described, just unfold and press into the window. They were stuck together when taken out of the package but had no issues with them ripping or anything when peeling apart. These should serve their purpose just fine.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Very well made shade
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Thought they might not stay on the windows, but that is not an issue. Contact adhesion is due to the soft plastic-type inner shade liner that also helps cut penetrating sunlight. I've actually forgotten about them being on the windows several times, ran the window down only to realize the shade was being "swiped" into the door. Luckily I was able to catch it in time and run it back up. After pulling this mindless stunt several times, the shades are still 100% like new, working great.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Enovoe Car Window Shade - No SunShade - Very transparent
customer_reviews.text: Not working as expected. Very transparent, Sunlight falls directly on the face. Not happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: They really work
customer_reviews.text: During the summer months we are on the road quite a bit & the sun beats down. We’ve tried several repositioning window shades but, for now, these are the best we’ve had. They fold up easily. They unfold easily. Our 4 & 5 year old can attach them to their own windows or reposition them as needed. They keep most of the sun’s heat from bearing down on exposed skin and definitely block the brightness while still allowing us to see out the windows. Our windows are tinted but it isn’t enough to protect us on longer trips. We are pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: H. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stick to window and doesn’t provide any shade Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Murphy

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T STICK.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay on the window. Had to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my Jeep Grand Cherokee window
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my Jeep Grand Cherokee window. They block the sun for babe (who sits behind the passenger seat) and it was so easy to install. Babe cannot reach but I think it would take a bit of effort for her to remove. These cover most of my window and I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SHSTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It fits fine on my Lexus GX460's windows
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine on my Lexus GX460's windows. The "magic stick" comes from its plastic side. Another side is fabric. The only problem is static electricity when you pull it out from the window. But, it is still much better than the sucking cups. I've been using for two days - no drop yet.
customer_reviews.author: blnonline

customer_reviews.title: To large for most cars
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit most cars or SUV’s. However, will fit pickup trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! If it fits.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these 3 stars just for being an excellent & functional product. Just about an inch too big for the rear windows of my 2016 mazda cx5 :/ Making it work, but smaller options would be cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Weaver

customer_reviews.title: NOT effective; child cries
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT recommend for infants and toddlers. Mine had a tendency to scream in the car seat and I am convinced this was at least partially due to the ineffectiveness of these shades. Now that my child is verbal, he explicitly expresses that the sun bothers his eyes WITH these shades covering his window. I am off to find another solution. Save your child and yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I would never say these fit most car windows. They are way too big for both family car's back windows (SUVs) back windows. Wish I measured my windows first instead of trusting the description.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S

customer_reviews.title: Poor sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Too thin, Poor sun protection doesn’t come close to blocking direct sun. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Frances R. Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: UV maybe? I wouldn't consider it a shade
customer_reviews.text: Once a week I drive my kiddos to my moms house who lives about an hour away. My son is always in the sun for the whole drive (highway driving- North to south in the morning then south to north in the evening) I got these to shade him from the sun and they DO NOT keep him shaded. I can see him in his infant mirror and he will be squinting! he gets super hot. Maybe they provide UV protection but they do not provide shade.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMom

customer_reviews.title: Kept falling off
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. These are a disaster. They kept falling off and I lost them. I now have to buy new shades. What a pain.
customer_reviews.author: VIRGO78

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bigger sized ones to try and cover more of the window in my sedan which is a bigger sedan (in the advertising it says the big ones could also fit on bigger sedans) this is not true. They hang below the window. When my packaged arrived it also looked as if I was sent a returned one because it had holes throughout the black mesh part. Not satisfied with these at all. It also looks very tacky than you would think when it is up on the window.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R.

customer_reviews.title: STOP SHOPPING..... THESE ARE THE SHADES YOU NEED
customer_reviews.text: I have already recommended these to several new moms, and all have purchased them and love them. These cling so well with multiple removes and re-attachment. I use them on my back windows and my back windshield (I called my local sheriff dept to make sure it's ok, and it is) I have been using these for over a year with zero issues. My son is in the middle, so I haven't had any issues with him touching them or pulling them down. I have NOTHING negative to say about these. They are the BEST window shades out there!
customer_reviews.author: MaryWHicks13

customer_reviews.title: Product does not stick to windows
customer_reviews.text: My son can easily pull it off. It does not stay stuck to the window.
customer_reviews.author: InterstellarGuy

customer_reviews.title: At the edges there is a covered metal ring or wire that easily gets deformed
customer_reviews.text: the shades will not "stick" on my SUV windows, it has a plastic film on the back which is wrinkled and crunchy ( it might be because the pack 3 shades into a small bag), At the edges there is a covered metal ring or wire that easily gets deformed, i have to find the way to find the proper shape. Poor workmanship, the stitches are not secure. I mean I was not really happy with this product that I just trough them to the garbache. I don't understand why so many good reviews. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: These car window shades do keep my car cool during the Summer months. It takes minimal time to put them on and almost no time at all to take them off the car windows. It's also convenient to be able to fold them up and place them in the provided little black pouch for storage. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bestvnteas

customer_reviews.title: Semi truck driver approved! Work so damn well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a semi truck driver, we can't tint the company truck windows. The sun comes in harsh a lot. These sun blockers are freaken amazing. So easy to peel off and readjust. Even when driving (which I don't recommend you to do while driving). Going to buy another set for my parents. Added a with and without photos. I don't even wear my sunglasses when I have the sun blocker on.
customer_reviews.author: SemiJSP

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to break your windows
customer_reviews.text: These cling well and are thin but that's the problem. Do NOT leave them on any power windows after you leave the car. If you live in a hot climate, you know that you have to roll down your windows when you first get in the car and blast the AC to reduce the oven-hot temps. Well, if you forget these shades are there and automatically roll your windows down, they are thin enough to slide down into the door along with the window, but too thick to come back up without yanking off your window stripping, which you can only fix by replacing the entire door panel. This cheap little monstrosity cost me hundreds in repairs.
customer_reviews.author: E. James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to shade a few plants in our vegetable garden. They are the perfect size, will let the wind blow through, and the price for four is great. First I removed the plastic sheet that was supposed to be placed on window glass. Pull the plastic up away from the mesh and cut carefully with scissors. It comes off easily. I used large bag ties (from the market produce dept) to attach the shields on our garden trellis. One shield stands alone on four "legs" made from scrap wood. The plants get enough sun to be happy and still have protection from our high desert summers!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Blue

customer_reviews.title: WARPED MY TINT AND I HAD TO PAY $400 TO GET THEN REDONE!
customer_reviews.text: If there was a 0 star that's what I would rate the item. The item is ok per se at it does what it's supposed to do HOWEVER PLEASE BE WARNED THAT IT RUINED MY VERY EXPENSIVE TINT and I had to pay $400 get them redone. The plastic on the back of this warped my tints. If your car does not have tints this will be ok to use. If you do, it's not worth it. I'm warning you. I'm so irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe031403

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the good reviews even though I didn't think they sounded like they would live up to the hype. Surprisingly I have found that I like them very much. They stuck right to the windows, block the sun from the entire window, and are easy to remove. They haven't fallen off once despite very hot weather. Of course, you can't put the window down while they're attached. They fit perfectly on both of our suvs--an explorer and a gmc both. They may be too large for a smaller windowed vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Wishing they came in half the size
customer_reviews.text: Great product! clings to window and is perfect - we needed it for our side by side UTV to help the glare. They were a bit long for that purpose and not a side window purpose. I put a strip of felt on back half way long ways and same on top of it on the front and sewed two lines on each side then cut down the middle and clipped the wire ends. Then we put gorilla tape on the ends to keep the screen on. One made two halves for the tops of the window in the UTV! Worked perfectly - maybe the company should consider making these would be great for several things.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Works great but unsightly from the outside
customer_reviews.text: The items sticks to the windows very well. They provide the shading and even privacy expected. Only thing that took us by surprise was the appearance of the item from outside of the car. The side of the shade that sticks to the window looks messy from the outside. It is like a thick saran wrap layer that clings to the window. Every crease shows, and there are quite a few of them. It's a lot of work to get the creases out. Other than the appearance from the outside, the shades work well - they cling to the window, they fold down easily for storage, they provide shading and privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not 100%
customer_reviews.text: The shape is not practical for the shape of a window. The sun hits me right at the top left corner of my window but with the shape of the shade I can’t get the shade into the top left corner of the window. It does however seem to block the sun. I still feel my face get heated. it doesn’t seem to block the heat. Since it came with four I have to use two to cover my window. They overlap slightly but again you can’t get to the corners because the shade is shaped round. They are nowhere near as square looking as they are in the picture. I drive a Ford expedition.
customer_reviews.author: KristySunshine

customer_reviews.title: Why the good reviews?
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the good reviews for these car shades... They came folded up and have yet to lay flat. Finally got two mostly flat and they don't adhere to the windows. Cleaned the windows and followed the directions repeatedly, still not sticking. Finally gave up and used tape to hang them (toddler hates the sun in her eyes and we were about to leave for a long road trip so I didn't have time to return for something else). Thankfully they mostly kept the sun out of her eyes, except for the section that wasn't covered (slightly too small for the windows).
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: What you see if what you get
customer_reviews.text: These work just as stated on their product page. When I had a usage question I emailed them and got an immediate response. This seems to be a company interested in serving its customers well. As these are designed to be able see through them, they won't block heat as much as ones designed for stationary use, like for a windshield when parked. You will want to consider the shape of your window (I measured mine before ordering) as there may be other styles/sizes that work better for you.
customer_reviews.author: WiseGuy

customer_reviews.title: FIRST CLASS CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!! THANKS!
customer_reviews.text: : "I didn’t have a perfect match when I attempted to attach them to my windows. WITHOUT SOLICITATION they reached out to me to ask about my satisfaction with their product. I told them about the fitting problem and without hesitation, the owner quickly responded and advised he would send out the next best fit without delay. This was customer service at its BEST, and I received FIRST CLASS TREATMENT." And NOW, I received my replacement shades that fit beautifully and do a FABULOUS JOB blocking out the sun. I can hardly wait to go on my long road trip, knowing that I will not be under the grueling sun... and can just enjoy the trip. Thanks ENOVOE!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Baker

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to use on a 3000 mile road trip. They were used for side windows in both the front and back of a 2019 Subaru Forrester. Attaching and detaching to the windows was fast and easy. You can see through them so they can be used on the driver side window. They stayed attached using static electricity until removed. Two have been on the rear windows for over two months. Folding them up is easy once you get the hang of it. Passengers have remarked on how well they work. You cannot roll the windows down while these are in place. We would definitely purchase these again if needed, but they seem to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Really dark and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased other sun window screens and hated that they didn’t stay on. These are great. The lining making them more sturdy and they stay in place. I have a midsize suv and they fit fine and leave very little space around them. Also they darken really well. I’d say the only downside is if you have older kids they’re a bit too dark and prevent them from seeing out the window. But for an infant they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Dambrie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, it works and holds the window well
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that they would stick to the windows using static technology. They hold perfectly. I didn’t drive my car for over a month during quarantine, and when I did finally drive, I noticed that part of the product seems to have sort of “melted” onto the window. It left a sticky black mess. I live in southern Louisiana and it can get insanely hot in the car while parked. I think it’s a good product, and I feel what happened to me is probably an anomaly. I would suggest not leaving them in on your window if parked for a long time in extreme temperatures. I’m still using them, and they still stick and work well
customer_reviews.author: jimi

customer_reviews.title: Cannot see through when driving
customer_reviews.text: The installation was very easy. However - these are similar to blackout shades - I had one on my rear window, and I could not see through it at all. I had another one on my rear driver's side window and it made checking my blindspot very difficult. I could see partially through this one, but it obstructed my sight significantly. Overall, these are dangerous when used while driving. Pros: Installation was incredibly simple and my baby was happy to have the sun out of his face. Cons: Unsafe while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Shades work effectively
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida and dealing with the bright sun; I find these shades are helpful in lessening the amount of heat and UV rays coming through the driver's window. The glare is controlled by positioning the shade on the side window - the only negative is the film which allows the shade to remain in place creates a slight distortion when looking through it - making it necessary to sometimes removing the shade to be certain of traffic movement. Otherwise, it serves my purpose for purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Set of 4 Easy to use Nice Quality Sun Shades!!!  Love how convent they are to use!
customer_reviews.text: These shades are so easy to use I was highly impressed with how easy they are to put up. They stay in place and not fall off. Great quality product. I was concerned that it might fall easily on my new grand baby. It does not move without your removal of it. There comes a set of 4. I keep two in my car and two in my husbands car to shade my grandchild. They came in a small pack to keep them in. They fold easily to put back in pack if you don't want to leave them up. I have used these on my front windshield when my sun visor tore. Love these will be buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmi

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: they are pretty flimsy - they stick to the windows ok but they will come off in extreme Texas summer heat. You can't roll the window down, even a couple of inches, without removing them, or they scrunch up. , And it is likely illegal to drive with them on because it is difficult to see oncoming traffic. So you have to open all the doors, peel them all off the windows, fold them up and store them every time you want to go somewhere. I still have to open all the car doors and let the heat out because they do not cover the entire window so you still get a lot of sun in the car
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and they don't damage the window. I like that they pack down into a compact bag for travel. I also like that if they do fall (or get pulled) on to baby, they're lightweight so they won't cause any harm. They seem to remove and re-stick well thus far. They cover the majority of my back windows of my Subaru Outback and help to provide shade to the carseat. My only complaint is that the borders are somewhat thick and they make it a little more difficult to see out of the back drivers' side window. I'll be taking that one down, but it seems to work well on the passenger side backseat window.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: does not cling to window in cold climates
customer_reviews.text: the static cling does not work in cold weather. the shade fell multiple times onto my baby in his car seat while we were traveling. I do not recommend these shades as they do not work as stated. Also, they are extremely difficult to see through when checking your blind spot.
customer_reviews.author: Tangible

customer_reviews.title: What a great product
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I came across this window screen sun deflector. My truck has a light tint on the front side windows and I did not want to darken the window permanently because of night driving. This window reflector works so well by being able to fold easily and store in the side door pocket. When the sun is blinding me as the driver I can just lift it up and it flips out on its own and practically jumps on the window by itself. The reflector adheres well to the window and will not fall off. Sorry for such a long review but I am so impressed by this purchase. Thanks Enovoe
customer_reviews.author: manvelman

customer_reviews.title: Use caution !
customer_reviews.text: Ordered pack of four. Received pack of two. One screen was permanently twisted and unusable. Edit to add, I tookthe twisted screen, placed between flat cardboard sheets and left in sun for a few hours. It appears that it may now be usable as the previous twist, while still there, is now minimal. Now allowing to cool, previous severe twist does not seem to be reappearing.
customer_reviews.author: wingmanjim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I have been searching for! BUT ... useless in a cold climate.
customer_reviews.text: Super well-made design. Perfect fit for my Subaru Impreza Sport Wagon. Great quality and the compact size and storage bag are terrific. Fits easily in the glovebox. Simple to use. Adheres with just a touch. Exactly what I was looking for. BUT ... I discovered quickly this winter that these are useless in a cold climate. Will not adhere to a cold window. Winter snow glare in Montana can be worse than summer sun glare.
customer_reviews.author: Montana PioneerTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: These do NOT block the sun!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. They barely block out the sun which was my entire reason for buying these! Doubling them up doesn’t work well either, the second one just falls off. They have wound up in the trunk of my car and will unfortunately end up in the garbage. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great suction. Great product for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: These sun shades are great. I have a 3 week old baby and needed something quickly because I hadn't thought to get these before I had him. These are fantastic, I put one on his window in the car the day that I received them and it is literally still just as stuck to the window as it was then. It's been over a week There's no sign of it beginning to loosen or anything like that. They block the sun very well then definitely helped my little guy to be comfortable in the car! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Corren Love

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: The first set I ordered did not fit well. A little larger than advertised and somewhat warped so they didn't stay on the sunroof well so I returned them. The company contacted me and I explained the problem. They sent out a new set and they fit well and are staying put. Thank you, Enovoe! Good product and Great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sun glare!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our trip to Florida this year and boy did they help with the sun and glare from the sun! Easy up and easy down! Just slap it on the window! And they fold up nicely! But if you're going to fold them up to store them, be prepared to have to stretch them out and flatten them as they will have a bend to them from being folded up, and they won't go on the window very flat. I just don't fold them. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Avid-Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Best window shade
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product out there. We have tried a lot of window shades but nothing comes close to this. It uses static to stick to the window which is so much better than a suction cup. It cleans easily and comes off with no effort at all. I definitely recommend it and will definitely buy again. Their customer service was very accommodating as well. I purchased a smaller shade thinking it would fit on our SUV window, turns out I needed a bigger one. I sent them an email, they got back to me and sent me the bigger shade.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry P.

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I know about these sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of applying to my windows. I have a Kia Soul and these are great on all 4 windows. There is just a small outside edge of light around the screen but nothing to cause an issue. I can see fine through the passenger side and back window screens continually up. I do take my driver's side screen down for driving. I live in the Phoenix area and we have recently reached 117 degrees for a couple of days. With my dashboard sunscreens in place, these really help with the interior heat while parked outdoors at work. So easy to apply and reapply. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: grandmaT

customer_reviews.title: Useful, but doesn't block out everything
customer_reviews.text: These are as easy to "install" (if you can even call it that) as advertised, and do a decent job of blocking out most sunlight. However, we've frequently run into issues where the size and format doesn't help with the additional side panels of the car windows (separated from the main middle window) that light pours into. On super sunny days, it does also seem like our daughter is bothered with the sun in her face even through the shade. Good start, but not a complete solution for blocking out sunlight in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: swit0028

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you don't have to use suction cups! At first, I didn't know how this would works, but it does! Do I know how long this will last, NO, however; for now, it's working. The backside (the side you place on the window) is completely covered in some sort of "plastic" or "vinyl" covering which makes it stick to the window without having to use any suction cups. I have only tried adhering them and have not actually used them going down the road in heat yet. When I do, I'll follow up with another review.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen H.

customer_reviews.title: I would measure your car window first.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 Honda Civic HF and unfortunately they didn't fit my back window. I don't necessarily blame the product because I didn't go the extra step to measure my window. I still managed to put it to use. My order came with a set of 3 window shades. Two of the shades cover the sun from the big back window. I have not had any problems with the shades not sticking to the windows. Overall great product. However, I do wish that in the description they provided a list of cars that would be compatible with the shades.
customer_reviews.author: Madanna

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love these shades. I love that they easily cling to the glass of the window are are super easy to move around if necessary. Make sure you measure your window before ordering to get the best fit. I neglected to measure so the ones I ordered aren't the best fit for my windows, but I will still use them for sure. I use them to keep the sun from my newborns eyes, and one also came in handy on our recent road trip to keep the hot sunlight off of me as I rode in the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Smarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We already have a few similar shades & needed more for our growing family so gave these a try. They appear to stick well & are easy to take on & off. I did have to play around with them a bit the first time I put them on as the packaging means they're folded up so I had to push down a bit to have it attach all the way around. Once I did that, we were good to go! They seem easy enough to fold back up to store in the little pouch but I will probably just keep them up all year long.
customer_reviews.author: Vfresta

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not effective
customer_reviews.text: I get why these are the most popular sun shades for car windows. They stay on great and are flexible and easy to put on, take off and store. It is very nice not to have to worry about the suction coming lose due to heat or my child being able to yank them off. Cons - they really don't block off that much sun. It's possibly that they leave the car slightly cooler than it would normally be, but I'm not sure much sun is getting blocked. My son still cries from the sun being in his eyes. Even still, I would purchase this due to not knowing of another more effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great shade for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and shade works great. We just completed a 2.500 mile trip and shades worked great in blocking bright sun rays. I was going down to the auto parts store to buy the some shades that have the suction cups (we always loose the cups) but decided to try these since you got 4 for under $15.00. When they arrived, we were not sure, but after using them, I would definitely recommend these shades for your car or SUV. There is a trick to folding the shades for storage that I have not learned how to do yet.
customer_reviews.author: Menace

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: These stick to the window without any sort of issue at all. The clinging material is basically plastic food wrap only thicker and more durable. The size of these offers pretty good coverage on our small-ish SUV (Kia Sorento) but of course there are some small gaps on the sides as they're not custom fit the vehicle. I just position them so that the gap only allows light through a spot where my child's face is unlikely to be. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: tdnelson48

product_meta.title: Enovoe Car Window Shade - (4 Pack) - 21"x14" Cling Sunshade for Car Windows - Sun, Glare and UV Rays Protection for Your Child - Baby Side Window Car Sun Shades
feature_bullets: ABSOLUTE SUN PROTECTION - Do you want your child exposed to the sun's heat? Mesh fabric design on our car sun shade is Guaranteed to provide protection from sun glare and heat - The car window sun shade blocks over 97% of harmful UV Rays. This can protect your baby and passengers from skin irritation and bright sunlight. The car sun shades will additionally help keep your car cooler.

UNIQUE DUAL LAYER DESIGN - Enovoe Baby Car Sun Shades have a dual layer design which gives the best of both sides. Mesh side provides protection while maintaining visibility for driver. This static cling back allows easy car sunshade window application and removal without any adhesives or suction cups. Enjoy your hassle free driving with these side window car sunshade.

FITS MOST CAR WINDOWS - Enovoe car window shade comes in a pack of four and size of 21” x 14”. These Car Sun shades are designed to fit larger car side windows of SUVs, minivans and full size cars. Our sun shade is a breeze to install. Simply, place the sun shade on your side windows and run your hand across it. It’s really that simple.

BEST VALUE ON AMAZON - Comes with 2 Free Bonuses valued at $29. A Free Premium Pouch to store car window shade when not in use. And also Free E-Book filled with tips for keeping your children safe in the heat.
AN AUTOMOBILE MUST-HAVE: You’ll wonder how you ever managed without a set of these in your car. You won’t regret it!
